home.subtitle: Product Designer
home.description: I create modern and intuitive digital experiences by combining creative design and quality front-end development.

about.title: Who am I?
about.text1: Passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences, I combine
about.text1d: to bring innovative projects to life.
about.text2: Based in Brussels, I work with companies and startups to transform their ideas into modern and high-performing digital products. My approach blends minimalist aesthetics with optimal functionality.
about.text3: I believe in the importance of clear communication, maintainable code, and interfaces that put the user at the center of the experience.
